TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Paterungan, title = Paterungan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paterungan} }

S.FORM: Paterungan Itiniay i Fengbin Cen no Hualien ko Paterungan a niyaro', 83 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 227 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 88% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 200 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 12% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 27 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Kebalan 55%, Amis 27%, Tayal 1%, roma 5%.

Paterongan Itiniay i Fengbin Cen no Hoalien ko Paterongan a niyaro', 83 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 227 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 88% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 200 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 12% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 27 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Kebalan 55%, Amis 27%, Tayal 1%, roma 5%.
